name: Slime Crime
description:
Young Venom must protect his precious Mellon Blossom trees from the swarms of incoming Slime. Wrangle all the slimes you can before your precious Melons get devoured!  HOW TO PLAY
  • Use the WASD keys to move around
  • Use Space to throw your lasso
  • Press space to Wrangle your Slime!
  • Press shift to pull harder
  • Eat Mellon's to gain strength!
